scripts.build:fonts: shx mkdir -p dist/assets/fonts dist/assets/icons && shx cp -r src/assets/fonts/* dist/assets/fonts || shx echo no-fonts && shx cp -r src/assets/icons/* dist/assets/icons || shx echo no-icons
scripts.build:js: shx mkdir -p dist/assets/js && shx cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js dist/assets/alpine.min.js && shx cp -r src/js/* dist/assets/js || shx echo no-js-src
scripts.build:images: shx mkdir -p dist/assets/images && shx cp -r src/assets/images/* dist/assets/images || shx echo no-images
scripts.build:html: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -r src/*.html dist/
scripts.build:themes: shx mkdir -p dist/assets/themes && shx cp -r src/css/themes/* dist/assets/themes || shx echo no-themes
scripts.build:partials: shx mkdir -p dist/partials && shx cp -r src/partials/* dist/partials || shx echo no-partials
scripts.copy:misc: shx cp -f src/favicon.ico dist/ || shx echo no-favicon
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:js && npm run build:images && npm run build:html && npm run build:themes && npm run build:partials && npm run copy:misc
